meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of documents.
meanings.sent1: The documentational folder contained all the necessary paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer requested documentational evidence to support the case.
meanings.sent3: The documentational mix-up caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent4: Her documentational skills were as organized as a well-kept library.
meanings.sent5: The documentational process was as clear as following a recipe.

meanings.definition: Providing information or evidence in written or printed form.
meanings.sent1: The documentational report summarized the key findings.
meanings.sent2: The documentational brochure was handed out to all attendees.
meanings.sent3: His documentational jokes always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The documentational presentation painted a vivid picture of the project.
meanings.sent5: The documentational chart made the data easy to understand.
